B. KEMAL PASHA, J.
Dated this the 8" day of December, 2017
ORDER

On hearing the learned counsel for the petitioner and the
learned Public Prosecutor and also on perusing Annexure Al
order passed by the court below as well as Annexure A2 order
passed by this Court, it is hereby ordered that the petitioner
need not surrender his passport before the court below. In
case, CW2 is not available on the next posting date for
examination, the court below shall dispense with his
examination and shall proceed with the matter further. The
court below shall expedite the trial and dispose it of at the
earliest.

With this direction, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of.

Sd/-
B.KEMAL PASHA
JUDGE

Scl/08.12.2017
